1111.title: His default appearance

112.content:
After a particularly tough mission, Commander Shepard had ordered the Normandy to dock at the Citadel for a day of rest and relaxation while the ship was stocked and checked.

Lt. James Vega was enjoying a few drinks at one of the more exotic bars tucked away from view of the Presidium's pristine terraces, perfectly maintained gardens and high-end stores.

Nodding his head to the beat of the music, James took a swig on his beer, before placing it back on the bar counter he was leaning on. The club was dingy, covered in neon, and smelled vaguely of sweat and cheep cologne, but above all, nothing much was happening. James got all dressed up for nothing (well, as dressed up as he wanted to be)
wearing a tight black shirt, unbuttoned enough to show the cleavage of his pec muscles proudly, topped with a brown leather bomber jacket, his huge biceps bulging in the sleeves, and dark slim fitting jeans, wrapped tightly over his beefy leg muscles, and black boots.

All the others wanted a night in, Shepard was doing that thing where he jogged around the presidium doing errands, Kaiden was nursing a biotic implant induced headache, Garrus was doing... whatever Garrus did with the forward cannon, something about calibrations. James had even asked Liara, who said she was flattered along with "I'd like that, but maybe some other time".

With no fellow servicemen to drink with in sight, James paid his tab and began to make his way to the door.

'Maybe I can get a quick weight set back on the ship' he thought to himself. Just then a hand grabbed his arm.

"Hey big guy" said a voice. James turned to see a man, about 30, pretty fit looking wearing a grey hoodie, and a satchel. Confused, James made a quick guess where this was going.

"Oh.. uhh... hey. Sorry, i'm not ... into dudes" he said sheepishly.

"Then why are you in a gay club?"

James looked around. He indeed was in a gay club and hadn't even noticed, maybe it was because it was dark, or maybe he had a little more to drink then he thought. But that did explain all the free drinks he got.

'Really?... crap... I mean... I don't have a problem with..." James began to ramble awkwardly. "I mean, my best friend is gay, hell so is my commander... I think "

"Hey, don't worry about it" said the man, reassuringly. "So... you're a soldier?"

"Uhh yeah...Alliance Navy Marine actually" said James, scratching the back of his neck so his bicep bulged in his sleeve.

"Nice..." said the guy, smiling back. "So you work out all the time right?"

"Yeah... I'm just going to do a quick weight session back on ship actually" nodded James.

"Sweet" the man smiled and nodded back, before reaching into his bag for something. "Ya know.... i got something a guy like you might be interested in"

He pulled out a plastic screw top tub, no bigger then a jam jar. It looked like a pill pot.

"Woah... I uhh.... don't do steroids hombre" he said, raising his hands in defence.

"Pffft... who said anything about steroids, buddy" said the man, still smiling friendly. "These are organic supplements, none of that nasty shit"

"I don't know...." replied Vega crossing his arms, his brow furrowing. "I could get in a shit storm of trouble"

"Don't worry, it's not in violation of any substance listed illegal by the alliance navy" reassured the man "See for yourself"

He handed the pot to James, who scanned the ingredients. He wasn't lying. Intrigued, James turned to the front of the pot.

"Excelmega Growth Supplement, manufactured by ExoGeni" read James aloud, before looking back to the man. "This stuff makes you jacked?"

"Yeah, as big as you want" continued the salesman.

"Sweet" said James, with an impressed smile. He looked back to the pot and continued to read, "Possible side effects include heterosexual hormonal imbalance and increased libedo"

"Yeah, It may cause you to appreciate men a bit more, and be a little more horny then usual, but small price to pay right?" said the man.

"Well, the horny bit ain't bad" shrugged James.

"Look, you seem like a smart young guy, plus I like you, so I'm gonna give you a pot now, 50% off, plus I'll throw in something else for free"

The man picked a small pump bottle out of his bag, and handed it to his bulky customer. James read the bottle.

"Supersize XL - get the edge down below", read James pulled at the slightly cryptic slogan. "This make my dick bigger or something?"

"Exactly, or your balls, either works"

"Mierda..." muttered James. "Okay, you got a deal amigo, how much you want"

"Tell you what, its 150 credits, but if you wanna pay half now, try it out, see if you like it. If you don't, money back guarantee."

"Guess that's reasonable" shrugged James, fishing out 75 creds from his wallet. "All right, i gotta go test this out"

"Alright, just take it after your work out while your pumped, but be careful man, it's potent stuff"

"I will, thanks again" said James, as he headed to the transport lift to get back to the Normandy's docking bay.

-----------

A while later in the Normandy's cargo hold, James was just finishing up his weight set with some bench presses.
He had his useual grey Alliance marine shirt on (now with sweat stains running down the pits and across his wide back) and swapped his jeans for his navy-camo uniform combats and boots.

"Nugh... nughhh...ahhrhghh" grunted James, pushing out his last set. Putting the bar back on the rack, James sat up, wiping the sweat off of his forehead.

"Yeah, new PB" he said, flexing his chest to himself. He got up and looked at himself in the mirror, and began to flex, grinning to himself. "yeah... thats what taking about"

James whipped himself down with a towel, as he stepped on his scales. The display came up with 210lbs. At 6"1, this was pretty buff, but James wanted more.

"Man, no gains in two weeks" he grumbled to himself. Then he looked across at the Excelmega sitting on the supply create next to his bunk. "Hmm, might as well test this out"

James picked up the pot and sat on his bunk. Unscrewing the top, he saw a white powder inside. "Hmmm, guess it's a shake" he said. Picking up his shaker, he filled it with water before going back to the pot.

"Mix with 150 to 250 ml of water, 1 spoon is roughly equal to 30lbs of muscle mass growth. Use with caution."

James carefully spooned 1 spoonful of the powder into his shaker. He paused and contemplated adding another.

1343.content:
"Bloody piece of....!"

Jacob cursed before gritting his teeth irritably. Ever since his sister Evie had left London to hold meeting with the Assassin Council in India, Jacob had been left to handle the operations of their gang, the Rooks, unfortunately, that included the paperwork.

Shoving the large stack of paperwork aside, Jacob got up from his desk to clear his head, or sulk, as Evie would say.

"How she has the patience to do this is beyond me" he grumbled, pacing the floor of his personal train car. He looked out the window, watching as the grey smoggy buildings of Whitechapel rushed by. One of the plusses of having a train as a headquarters was the fact you could hop off and head to more interesting affairs at anytime, but despite temptation, the paperwork wasn't going to do itself.

"--Accountants are expensive, we can do it ourselves " mocked Jacob, before leaping onto the large couch opposite, laying back to stare at the ceiling, before taking a brief moment to scratch his balls in his trousers. "Honestly..."

Sighing, the roughish assassin then turned to look at the table next to him. On it was something very important, one of the Pieces of Eden, (powerful artefacts from a civilisation before humanity).

Evie had kept it hidden away, but Jacob felt it was safer where he could see it. After all, it was just a gaudy golden metal bauble shaped like an eye. Jacob picked it up and tossed it in the air, catching it, before examining it between his fingers.

"The Eye of Eden" he said aloud, in a condescending tone. Jacob had never been one for the ancient myths that were passed down through the order, and the fact that this relic looked like a cheep knick-knack from some curio shop didn’t convince him otherwise, but his sister seemed convinced it was still active.

“Not much to look at, are you”, continued Jacob, passing the artifact from hand to hand. He then turned it to look at the large crystal adorning its front, before rubbing some dust of with his thumb.

“Wish I knew what you do…” he mumbled.

Suddenly, the Eye began to glow. Jacob stared wide-eyed, with an expression between surprise and disbelief. Suddenly a sensation that could only be described as like having water and light funnelled into his head, made Jacob wince as he dropped the relic, letting it roll to the other side of the couch.

The glowing stopped. Jacob opened his eyes, panting, stunned at what just happened. He stared at the eye, wedged between the couch cushions. But it was no longer an unfamiliar bauble, but one he swore he knew his whole life. Every etching, every engraving, every mechanism inside. He knew what they all meant, how they all worked.

“You… you can change what people see…. what they are…. what they understand”, muttered Jacob. The Eye sat still, as if nothing ever happened.

Jacob cautiously picked up the Eye and got to his feet. Carefully holding the strange relic, he paced the car, before stopping at the mirror in front of him. He looked up at his reflection, thinking of what he could do.

“Well, change comes from within as they say. Where better to start with then myself”

Jacob looked at his appearance. Having just turned 23, Jacob always looked a little older then his age suggested, maybe it was the rough stubble that adorned his chiseled jaw line, or his thick dark eyebrows, the right knicked with a scar from when he was a boy, yet his brown eyes kept a youthful sparkle to them.

His body continued the illusion of an older man. Broad shoulders, a wide chest adorned with just enough chest hair, muscles toned and built throughout over a decade of training. All in all Jacob considered himself quite attractive, even down to the way he dressed.

Typically, Jacob never bothered with looking anything like a gentleman, opting for a flat cap to hide his slicked back brown hair and an old coat, with a shirt unbuttoned enough just to show off his lucky shilling necklace, and of course, the cleavage of his pecs.

But since he moved to London with his sister, he now boasts a more dapper ensemble; a fine gentlemen’s leather coat with quilted collar, a green paisley waistcoat underneath, his leather gear belt around his waist, his bracer and hidden blade on his left forearm. On his legs, Jacob now wore brown breaches and riding boots. He kept the shirt however as it suited him, but now wore a hat and cane when about (a sword concealed inside for combat).

“Still a handsome devil…” smirked the young assassin, stroking his stubbled jaw.

“You talking to yerself again laddie?”

A thick Scottish accent came from the other side of the car door, the voice belonging to Agnes, the train's owner and caretaker.

“Umm, no … now’s not really a good time Agnes” called out Jacob in the direction of the door.

“Ay, you got a girl in there, is she clean?”

“There’s no girl” he sighed in response, rolling his eyes.

“Oh, so it’s a laddie then, did na take you as the type” she cackled.

“Agnes, really?” Jacob scowled in the direction of the door.

“Ha, ha, am yanking ya chain ya wee daft. Ill leave you be Mr. Frye”

“If you’d kindly” replied Jacob with poorly veiled sarcasm. Jacob turned his attention back to the artefact.

“I suppose it couldn’t hurt to be bigger, stronger perhaps... maybe taller...”.

13432.content:
Jacob let his mind wander on the matter. Then, as if it read his thoughts, the eye glowed again. Instinctively Jacob shielded his eyes, holding the artefact at arms length as if it were a venomous snake.

Peering out through one eye, Jacob saw the light was weaving its way up his arm, coating him in a golden glow as it went. The young assassin panicked, dropping the Eye, trying to stop whatever it was engulfing him by shaking it off. But the deed was done; the relic had its orders.

Jacob closed his eyes as the Piece of Eden reshaped his form in a dazzling wave of light. His body grew taller, stretching until he was a good 7ft in height. Then, his muscles began to expand to unreal proportions. His shoulders grew to near football size, the rest of his arm muscles swelling to match, his wrists thickening, hands growing to the size of plates. The power of the artefact had also altered his attire; his shirt and waistcoat gave into the size of Jacob’s new chest, and vanished, leaving only his coat and gear belt around his waist, his huge pecs proudly on display. His trousers had changed too, retracting up his legs to form a pouch around his now huge bulge, concealed with a string fly that barely held the massive man meat in. Around the back of the pouch, leather straps held it in place around his thighs and waist, leaving his behind exposed under his coat. His boots, cane and leather gloves adjusted to his new size.

15511.content:
Geralt stumbled through the swampy undergrowth of the marshes of Velen, cluching his side. He withdrew his hand to look at the palm. It was crimson red with blood.

"Still bleeding. Damn Fiend" he grumbled.

Geralt had been tracking the Fiend for the past hour, but the monstrous creature found him first. Geralt managed to dispatch the hulking beast, but only after it's claw sliced through his side. He had taken his last swallow potion, but the bleeding was too fast. He needed help quickly.

"Stupid mistake... always stay downwind of a fiend" he cursed to himself.

Pressing his hand down to stem the bleeding, Geralt continued through the bog, until a picked up a different scent. He stopped, smelling the air.

"Herbs? burning?" he said, pausing. "Sandalwood, and... lavender?"

He quickly turned to face the direction of the scent.

"Cant be more then 500 yards"

He began to follow the smell. Sure enough, he saw the glowing windows of a small hut. Feeling drained, the Witcher began to stagger towards it. Leaning against the frame, he rapped on the door.

"Anyone home!"

The door creeked open. Standing there was an old woman in a shawl.

"You need help, deer boy?"

"Do you have any... argghh"

Geralt fell to his knees. The old lady disappeared momentarily, before returning with a red vile.

"This should heel you, but be careful. It's potent"

Geralt took the vile and took out the cork. Cautiously, he took a sip. Suddenly, he felt a burning sensation all over his body, like every muscle was on fire. He fell to his back, writhing. After a few seconds, the burring stopped. Geralt looked at the wound, only to see it was gone. Surprised, he began to get to his feet.

"Many thanks..." he began, only to turn to see an abandoned shack.

"Strange..."

Geralt searched the empty shack, to find no trace of the woman. The only thing left was the vile in his hand. Theorising the old woman's disappearance as magic, Geralt continued on his journey back to the nearby village to collect payment for the Fiend.

Little did he know, the potion had side affects

info.brief_description: A collection of muscle gain stories about the male characters of various game universes.
info.description:
This is a hyper/muscle gain interactive story for the hot guys of the gaming world. Warning: content contains themes of sexual nature. Your discretion advised.

18+ Only!

A few guidelines:

Do's
Hyper muscle/genitalia is allowed.
Gay male content preferred, but hetro is okay (if female isn't explicit)
Try to keep along the lines of lore/themes of each games respective genre.
Muscle gut physique allowed, but no full on fat.
Steroid use and side effects of use also allowed

Don'ts
No female growth/sexual content (plenty of other stories for that)
Keep to the tone of a thread (no sudden 'he gained 100000lbs)
No sexual content about characters that are under the age of 18.
Don't bull your way through a character you don't know. Keep the nerds (such as myself) happy, do google search etc...
